about_the_game:
About us.
-Welcome to Tao universal China Game Studio.
- We are devoted to creating independent and original games with attractive gameplay, independent and original world views, and rich content that hopefully will be tasteful works of art.
-The Tao traveller1900 QQ Group:3563044733

About this game.
-The Tao Traveller is a 2D side scroller game.In this game, you need to move forward in the chaotic era.Feel the characters in two realities, defeat enemies and seek the truth on the tremendous map. All of this is not only related to you but related to the world.

Game Features
-Scenes with Chinese cultural style and horizontal 2D levels form a higher level of exploration and more time features.
-Imaginative monsters from ancient legends will be your friends or your enemies.
-A vivid plot to let you vicariously into the world.
-A large map, crisscrossing routes, unexpected paths, full of exploitability.
-yihana and zuhuling are the perfect partners to defeat your enemies by using "sorcery"or other methods.
-Hundreds of monsters, each with their characteristics, and fierce bosses. use your combat to defeat them.
-A variety of weapons and skills to form interesting combinations.
-Through exploration, players view the world in their way, all your exploration will be recorded in the "White Ze"and can be accessed at any time.
-Not only a side scroller, it also has some RPG elements that will satisfy your exploration to this world.

Welcome to "Tao Traveller 1900"!

name: 本源行者 Tao Traveller 1900

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GTX+ (1GB)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

publishers: 本源界中国游戏工作室
short_description: In "Tao Traveller 1900", you will come to a world where reality and legends are intertwined. Exploring the secrets behind the decay and turmoil as the "yihana" in the chaotic era. Touch the profoundness of Chinese culture, Feel the characters and how everything changes in two realities ......
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, English, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
